Nengi Omuku (a mụrụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe.
A mụrụ ya na Asaba, Delta State, Nigeria
na M.A na Fine art na Slade School of Fine Art, University College London
Ọrụ nka nke Nengi Omuku enweterela ya agụmakwụkwọ na onyinye ya, gụnyere onyinye nka nke British Council CHOGM nke Eze Nwanyị Elizabeth nke Abụọ nyere.
